sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="handleSubmitComment">
    <textarea v-model="newComment" placeholder="Write a comment..." :rows="3"></textarea>
    <button>Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "CommentForm",
  props: {
    comments: Array,
    book: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      newComment: ""
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleSubmitComment() {
      this.$store.dispatch("addComment", {
        book: this.book,
        content: this.newComment
      })
      this.newComment = ""
    }
  }
}
</script>
